text: Hello! I got stuck with the themes. Is it possible to have one theme active and used among some pages and add another one for only a few pages? The most important thing is not to effect the other pages that are in production. Thanks in advance for your answers!

yes, this is possible.

Your brand kit will determine the default theme that is visible when you create new pages.

When you choose a different theme to build a page with for those pages, it will change your default - you'll just want to change it back when you're done to make sure any new pages for the other theme are still created with the right one.
And all previously created pages will remain the same even if the theme was changed?
yes nothing changes, a theme is just a collection of templates, it's not binded to the whole site like wordpress does
